item.title: Monday Morning NFL Top 10 Rankings: Rams Push for Top Spot; Jaguars, Bills Climb
item.description: As the 2025 season comes down the stretch, the Broncos and Rams battle for the top spot, while the Seahawks, Jags and Bills lurk.

item.title: 2026 College Football Transfer Portal Tracker: Who Are the Top Names Expected to Enter?
item.description: The college football transfer portal doesn't technically open until Jan. 2, but players are announcing their intentions to enter the portal.

item.title: Which NFL Teams have been eliminated from 2025-26 playoffs?
item.description: Check out this article for a list of NFL teams eliminated from the NFL playoffs, as well as a list of teams on the bubble.

item.title: Philip Rivers Emotional After Return: 'Just thankful, grateful, that I was out there'
item.description: Philip Rivers fought back tears after making his return, hoping that his comeback teaches his kids and high school players he coaches to not be scared...

item.title: Steelers vs. Dolphins Prediction, Odds, Picks for Monday Night Football
item.description: Preview the Week 15 matchup between the Pittsburgh Steelers and Miami Dolphins with predictions, odds, over/under, spread, betting lines and more.
